infoText: Update v2.8.3 is complete and should be on the launcher shortly. Map has been updated again RC4, had to update the level.dat and tweak a customNPC quest.
For existing maps, you should only need to copy the customNPC folder over to your existing world as well as the level.dat.
Thank you for playing TolkienCraft II and please let me know if you have any questions or issues while playing!
